transcripts.text: Shalom, I'm Messianic Rabbi Zev Porat, and welcome to a special outreach update from Jerusalem, Israel.  We are living in exciting and prophetic times.  There has never been a generation closer to the second coming of Jesus Yeshua than this generation.  We're not setting any dates, but we know that the time is near.  We know that the veil is being lifted.  2 Corinthians 3, verse 16, and Jews are being saved like never before.  There is a revival in Israel.  In Israel, like around the world, the COVID-19 is shaking those that don't believe in Yeshua.  And unfortunately, even some that do believe in Yeshua.  And he's using it to scare Jews in Israel because he knows that his time is near.  Revelation chapter 12, verse 12.  Therefore rejoice, you heavens, and you who dwell in them, but woe to the earth and the sea, because the devil has gone down to you.  He is filled with fury because he knows that his time is short.  The devil and his demons are doing all they can to put panic into people, are doing all they can to try to stop the gospel.  But we rejoice because the devil's running out of ammunition.  The best he's got is COVID-19.  But those under the blood of the Lamb, the remnant, as believers in Yeshua, in Jesus, we understand this is spiritual warfare.  We understand that the devil's at rage.  Greater is he in us than the one in the world.  We overcome by the testimony of the blood of Yeshua, Jesus.  We overcome by the blood of the Lamb.  We're using the panic of the COVID-19, the demonic outpouring, to preach the gospel.  As believers in Yeshua and Jesus, we understand that Satan's power is limited.  If Satan has launched this COVID-19 and God allowed it as a wake-up call, it means that now, more than ever, it's time for the gospel to go forth.  Orthodox rabbis in Israel that don't believe in Yeshua are shaking from the COVID-19.  Jews in Israel are shaking from the COVID-19.  And as a result, many are flocking to the Kotel area, the western wall, to pray.  But because of the panic of the COVID-19, even the Kotel area has restrictions. As Orthodox Jews, secular Jews, we're all talking about the COVID-19.  We're all saying, we came here to get a blessing.  We don't want our family to get the COVID-19.  Satan is working overtime. I was sharing with many, but I noticed that there was a line.  I looked inside the Kotel area and I noticed that there was a rabbi there, a very known rabbi, Harav Yaakov Metzger, Rabbi Jacob Metzger.  He was praying and crying at the Kotel area and others were waiting to get a blessing from him.
